ハメネイ師、米・イラン仲介目指す仏大統領を「世間知らずか、米の共犯者だ」

04 Nov 2019, 11:20



３日、テヘランで演説する最高指導者のハメネイ師（ＡＰ）

　【テヘラン＝水野翔太】イランの最高指導者ハメネイ師は３日、テヘランで演説し、「米国との交渉はいかなる問題も解決しない」と述べ、対米交渉を禁じる外交方針を改めて示した。演説は、在テヘラン米大使館占拠事件から４日で４０年となるのに合わせて行われた。
　ハメネイ師は、対米交渉に踏み切ったキューバや北朝鮮の例を挙げ、「米国の制裁は全く緩和されていない。米国が譲歩することはない」と強調した。米・イランの仲介を目指すマクロン仏大統領についても、「彼は世間知らずか、米国の共犯者だ」と批判した。
　トランプ米大統領はイランとの直接交渉を望んでおり、イランのロハニ政権も対話を進めたい意向をちらつかせていた。大統領の権限を上回る最高指導者が拒否姿勢を鮮明にしたことで、関係改善はいっそう難しくなりそうだ。
text:
Mr. Hamenai, the president of France who aims to mediate between Iran and the United States, "isn't known to the public or is a US accomplice"

04 Nov 2019, 11:20



Supreme Leader Hamenei (AP) giving a speech in Tehran on the 3rd

[Tehran = Shota Mizuno] Iranian leader Hamenei spoke at Tehran on the 3rd, stating that "negotiations with the United States will not solve any problems" and renewed a foreign policy prohibiting negotiations with the United States. The speech was made to coincide with the 40th anniversary of the four days since the occupation of the US Embassy in Tehran.
Mr. Hamenei gave an example of Cuba and North Korea who decided to negotiate with the United States, and stressed that "the US sanctions have not been eased at all. The US will not make concessions." The French President Macron, who aims to mediate between the US and Iran, also criticized, “He is a naive or an American accomplice”.
US President Trump wanted to negotiate directly with Iran, and the Iranian Rohani government flickered his intention to promote dialogue. As the supreme leader, who surpasses the president's authority, has made clear his refusal, it seems likely that improving the relationship will become even more difficult.
